queries.query: mutation CreateBook($title: String!, $author: String!) { createBook(input: { title: $title, author: $author }) { book { id title } } }
query GetBooks($limit: Int!) { books(limit: $limit) { id title author } }
mutation UpdateBook($id: ID!, $title: String, $author: String) { updateBook(id: $id, input: { title: $title, author: $author }) { book { id title } } }
query GetAuthors($name: String) { authors(name: $name) { name books { id title } } }
query GetBooksByAuthor($author: String!) { books(author: $author) { id title author } }
